content: >this pattern is available for downloading also on payhip 1 with a pay what you want option this is a sister design to norja /patterns/library/norja socks **pattern features ** - knitted cuff down - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - instructions written in metric and us terminology - sizes extra-small 54 sts small 60 sts medium 1 66 sts medium 2 72 sts large 78 sts and extra-large 84 sts - ribbed heel flap and round heel turn - charts but no written instructions for stranded colourwork and striped gussets - estimated yardage 55-65 grams of mc and 25-35 grams of cc 1 https //payhip com/b/671m
